attributes.additional_details:
The North East of England has been targeted in the past by previous Tory governments ( ship building, mining )

This Goverment has targeted students the health service and cut the armed forces

And in the latest budget attacked Granny's whilst rewarding Tory Tax Dodgers by reducing the 50p tax rate

Just when I thought this Goverment could not inflict any more hurt and damage to the North East of England ....
They have now declared WAR on the Sausage Roll
With the introduction of VAT

They will be banning the Stottie Cake next !

It is time for the unhealthy Geordie masses to rise up and save the Sausage roll
